tools_.index_7_: [Repair] Try to repair the damaged table with the REPAIR command. You can only do a simple repair. If the repair is not successful, consider using the myisamchk tool.
tools_.index_8_: [Optimize] Execute OPTIMIZE command to recover unreleased disk space. Recommended executing it once a month.
tools_.index_9_: [Convert to InnoDB/MyISAM] Convert database table engine. Recommended converting all tables to InnoDB
